plot: After 18 years of separation, Kyle is forced to reunite with his sick and fading father Sam Phelps, a once famous Southern Rock musician. Sam's famous past has made him quite the celebrity ...
title: Hand Me Down
plot_es: After 18 years of separation, Kyle is forced to reunite with his sick and fading father Sam Phelps, a once famous Southern Rock musician. Sam's famous past has made him quite the celebrity ...
